Info.Title: Badge of Honor
Info.Writer: Anthony Thorne (screenplay), Kevin Barrett (screenplay), Nick Montalvo (screenplay), Agustin (screenplay), Anthony Thorne (story), Kevin Barrett (story)
Info.Actors: Mena Suvari, Martin Sheen, Lochlyn Munro, Natasha Henstridge
Info.Plot: Two narcotics detectives find themselves in an intense investigation lead by a determined Internal Affairs Detective after a child is wrongfully shot dead in a violent drug bust.
